Name: CAST_TRIGGERED
Description: Triggered (this makes spell cost zero mana and have no cast time) - bypasses many checks, only for scripts

Name: CAST_FORCE_CAST
Description: Forces cast even if creature is out of mana or out of range

Name: CAST_NO_MELEE_IF_OOM
Description: Prevents creature from entering melee if out of mana or out of range

Name: CAST_FORCE_TARGET_SELF
Description: Forces the target to cast this spell on itself

Name: CAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT
Description: Only casts the spell if the target does not have an aura from the spell

Name: CAST_IGNORE_UNSELECTABLE_TARGET
Description: Can target UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE - Needed in some scripts

Name: CAST_SWITCH_CASTER_TARGET
Description: Switches target and caster for spell cast

Name: CAST_MAIN_SPELL
Description: Marks main spell for ranged mode - DEPRECATED - use creature_spell_list instead

Name: CAST_PLAYER_ONLY
Description: Selects only player targets - substitution for EAI not having more params

Name: CAST_DISTANCE_YOURSELF
Description: If spell with this cast flag hits main aggro target, caster distances himself - EAI only - DEPRECATED - use creature_spell_list instead

Name: CAST_TARGET_CASTING
Description: Selects only targets that are casting - EAI only

Name: CAST_ONLY_XYZ
Description: Targets only coords of target and not unit
